definition.name: NXcollection
definition.doc: Use NXcollection to gather together any set of terms. The original suggestion is to use this as a container class for the description of a beamline. It is believed NXcollection should become a base class. For NeXus validation, NXcollection will always generate a warning since it is always an optional group. Anything placed in an NXcollection group will not be validated.

field.name: beamline
field.doc: name of the beamline for this collection
